title: Rikke, the Littlest Troll in Norway
description: Travel to the majestic lands of Norway with this series of short stories about Rikke the troll and her exciting adventures. This is the first in the Rikke series (presently unillustrated); introducing Rikke, and showing the reader why being the littlest troll in Norway perhaps isnt so bad after all.
author: Nikolina Nilsen
